title: Template review session ready
details:
Ready to review and improve template formatting for the notebook automation system.

CURRENT STATUS:
- Template-type naming standardized (main, program, course, class, module)
- Index generation working correctly with proper hierarchy detection
- Special folders (Case Studies, Lesson, Live Class) treated as modules

TEMPLATES TO REVIEW:
1. main - Top-level MBA program index
2. program - Program area within MBA curriculum  
3. course - Single course folder
4. class - Single class folder
5. module - Module/lesson/case study folder
6. Content templates with -note suffix

GENERATED FILE EXAMPLES CHECKED:
- MBA.md (main template) - includes program hierarchy
- Digital Program.md (program template) - includes MBA as program

Ready to address specific template formatting, content, layout, or metadata issues.
